To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private TasukiGap _tasukigap;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_tasukigap = TasukiGap(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_tasukigap.IsReady)
{
    var period = _tasukigap.Period.Value;
    var current = _tasukigap.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.tasukigap = self.TasukiGap(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.tasukigap.IsReady:
    period = self.tasukigap.Period.Value
    current = self.tasukigap.Current.Value
